title: Getting Started with Cmssy CLI
description: Learn how to install and use the Cmssy CLI to build and publish blocks to the marketplace.
content:
Installation

Install the Cmssy CLI globally using npm:

npm install -g cmssy-cli

Or use it directly with npx:

npx cmssy init my-blocks

Creating a New Project

Run the init command to scaffold a new blocks project:

cmssy init my-awesome-blocks

This will create a new directory with the following structure:

  • blocks/ - Your block components
  • templates/ - Page templates
  • cmssy.config.js - Project configuration

Development

Start the development server with hot reload:

cmssy dev

Open http://localhost:3000 to see your blocks in action.

Next Steps

Now that you have your project set up, learn how to:

  • Create your first block
  • Define block schema
  • Publish to the marketplace
